me.shivzee.util

Class Attachment

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.shivzee.util.Attachment

  • public class Attachment
extends Object
    The Attachment class represents an email attachment.

    This class wraps attachment information including metadata such as filename, content type, size, and download URL. It provides methods to access attachment properties and download the attachment content.

    For more information about the API, see API Documentation.

        Checks if the attachment is related to the email content.
        Returns:

        Returns:
        the size of the attachment in KiB

      • getDownloadUrl

        public String getDownloadUrl()
        Gets the download URL for the attachment.

        Note: This URL will not work without a valid JWT token as an authorization header. Use the save(String) method to download the attachment.

        Returns:
        the download URL for the attachment

      • saveSync

        public boolean saveSync(String path,
                        String filename)
        (Synchronous) Save the Attachment on System
        Parameters:
        path - The Path to Save the File eg("C:/Data/Downloads/")
        filename - The File Name of The Attachment
        Returns:
        true if download was successful, else false
